actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-954.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of $353,000 by the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries for inquiries and investigations. Allocates $100,000 to be expended for the procurement of consultant services. Requires the chairman of the Committee to furnish the Committee on House Administration with information regarding any study or investigation intended to be financed from such funds.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
